language.entry: The Druid wears only light robes - intent on remaining as far from melee combat as possible. From a distance she channels the power of nature against her foes.

The Druid channels her love of nature into healing abilities, vicious plants and earth shaking tremors. A strong backbone to any party, the Druid can shape the battlefield to the advantage of her companions.

At rest, the Druid will attempt to cleanse the surrounding area of corruption and contact small animals to learn more about future challenges her party might encounter, The Druid also makes a fantastic cup of soup and gets cranky if her companions refuse to taste it.
This place has been taken by corruption, I shall cleanse it.
Oh really? thank you for the aid little one.
I made us some soup dearies, have some!
A fine mulch you shall make.
I should have brought a bigger bag.
Is this how I shall pay for my sins?
The tree still stands, and so do I!
I have seen daisies more fearsome than you!
What is there realy to be afraid off?
My duty is not yet fulfilled.
The corruption will be driven back!
These old bones are not done yet!
Folow me, I shall bring you to safety!
Flowers bloom even after the most harsh of winters!
Do not worry, I have been doing this for a long time.
Follow my lead young one, I will lead you to safety
Come, we shall purify this place!
Our bark is worse than their bite!
The corruption is everywhere, it is inescapable!
The corruption is everywhere, it is inescapable!
One of you is a host for deceases, do not try to hide it!
These old bones have seen too much.
I am nothing more than a vile witch, death would be too kind a faith for me...
As I have sacrificed another so too must I be sacrificed...
Must I do everything around here?
Some must be culled so the strong may live, you fools are a fine example of that.
The wilds would swallow you within a day.
The young should listen to their elders!
You would make some fine mulch.
You will not stand in the way of my redemption!
I am too old to deal with the likes of you!
These old bones have seen too much...
I am nothing more than a vile witch, death would be too kind a faith for me...
My back hurts... my knees are weak... it will not be long before I finally die...
STOP FOLLOWING ME, THE SACRIFICE WAS NECESSARY
Life and death are part of the same cycle, We must die so we can live!
The trees here make no sense...
Stop asking questions, I am too old to answer them.
Nature is twisted here, we best keep moving.
Please, don't make me go further!
The shadows! they hide in the shadows!
Don't think I haven't figured out your plan.
What are you waiting for? I am right here!
Hit me! punish me for my sins!
You would not last a day alone in the wilds.
I don't need any help! I will take care of this myself!
I will not die because of your mistakes!
I have done so much, and for what?
The corruption will destroy nature, and then it will destroy us.
What is that? is it important?
I left my soup pot on!
Blood blood blood, blood will cleanse us all!
I, I, I don't know what to do!
Keep that thing away from me!
No, that's what they want us to do!
I'm not doing anything with you standing so close to me!
Have you tried doing it yourself?
No! I'm not listening to you anymore!
I am not falling for that.
Be quiet! I can't think with you fools screaming in my ears!
Make space! I shall take care of this.
You idiots! Why must i do everything myself?
Do not think you can fool me, I shall lead the way!
Make space! I shall take care of this.
I will take care of this myself!
Follow me! I found a safe haven!
The trees here make no sense...
Stop asking questions, I am too old to answer them.
Come and test yourself against the might of nature!
Run, I will hold them off...
Don't stand so close to me!
Come over here dearie, granny has a gift for you.
A sacrifice! I need a sacrifice!
Maybe this will pay fot what I have done.
This pain will help me focus.
Maybe this will pay fot what I have done.
Do you not understand!? I have to do this!
We can't escape what lives in our mind!
No not yet! I will not abandon him again!
It is using nature against me!
You fools caused this with your incompetence!
This is how it should be.
Even nature stands no chance against them!
Almost, I am certain that you will do better next time dearie!
Stop that! you are ruining the corpse!
You actually hit something this time?
All you are doing is making it more mad!
We could have ended this peacefully!
We will never pierce their armor!
You are trying to miss? are you not!?
How can you miss something that easy to hit?
No no no! you are supposed to hit them from below!
That was an easy to block attack! why are you trying to get us all killed?
I am right here you fools!
Am I below your notice? it's not proper to ignore an old lady!
That one is better off as mulch anyway.
This is where I should be.
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself...
No, I must do this myself...
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself...
No, I must do this myself...
No, I must do this myself...
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself...
No, I must do this myself...
No, I must do this myself...
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
I can see the end... was it all for nothing?
Winter or summer a tree will survive both, just like us.
I have seen my fair share of warriors, you are one of the best.
Did you see that rabbit earlier? I drew you a picture.
That wound needs some cleaning, good thing I am here.
I have same herbs for you, they will help you heal.
Oh stop complaining, my back hurts more than that little scratch.
Don't give up, I am right behind you.
Given enough care even a dying flower will bloom again.
Nature herself is a collection of many wonderfull things, just like our little group.
Shall I make us some soup?
Have I ever told you about that time I...
Oof... my back hurts, this rest shall do me some good.
All has been for nothing, it is time.

Stop asking questions, I am too old to answer them.
Nature is twisted here, we best keep moving.
Please, don't make me go further!
The shadows! they hide in the shadows!
Don't think I haven't figured out your plan.
What are you waiting for? I am right here!
Hit me! punish me for my sins!
You would not last a day alone in the wilds.
I don't need any help! I will take care of this myself!
I will not die because of your mistakes!
I have done so much, and for what?
The corruption will destroy nature, and then it will destroy us.
What is that? is it important?
I left my soup pot on!
Blood blood blood, blood will cleanse us all!
I, I, I don't know what to do!
Keep that thing away from me!
No, that's what they want us to do!
I'm not doing anything with you standing so close to me!
Have you tried doing it yourself?
No! I'm not listening to you anymore!
I am not falling for that.
Be quiet! I can't think with you fools screaming in my ears!
Make space! I shall take care of this.
You idiots! Why must i do everything myself?
Do not think you can fool me, I shall lead the way!
Make space! I shall take care of this.
I will take care of this myself!
Follow me! I found a safe haven!
The trees here make no sense...
Stop asking questions, I am too old to answer them.
Come and test yourself against the might of nature!
Run, I will hold them off...
Don't stand so close to me!
Come over here dearie, granny has a gift for you.
A sacrifice! I need a sacrifice!
Maybe this will pay fot what I have done.
This pain will help me focus.
Maybe this will pay fot what I have done.
Do you not understand!? I have to do this!
We can't escape what lives in our mind!
No not yet! I will not abandon him again!
It is using nature against me!
You fools caused this with your incompetence!
This is how it should be.
Even nature stands no chance against them!
Almost, I am certain that you will do better next time dearie!
Stop that! you are ruining the corpse!
You actually hit something this time?
All you are doing is making it more mad!
We could have ended this peacefully!
We will never pierce their armor!
You are trying to miss? are you not!?
How can you miss something that easy to hit?
No no no! you are supposed to hit them from below!
That was an easy to block attack! why are you trying to get us all killed?
I am right here you fools!
Am I below your notice? it's not proper to ignore an old lady!
That one is better off as mulch anyway.
This is where I should be.
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself...
No, I must do this myself...
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!

No, I must do this myself...
No, I must do this myself...
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
I can see the end... was it all for nothing?
Winter or summer a tree will survive both, just like us.
I have seen my fair share of warriors, you are one of the best.
Did you see that rabbit earlier? I drew you a picture.
That wound needs some cleaning, good thing I am here.
I have same herbs for you, they will help you heal.
Oh stop complaining, my back hurts more than that little scratch.
Don't give up, I am right behind you.
Given enough care even a dying flower will bloom again.
Nature herself is a collection of many wonderfull things, just like our little group.
Shall I make us some soup?
Have I ever told you about that time I...
Oof... my back hurts, this rest shall do me some good.
All has been for nothing, it is time.
The Druid wears only light robes - intent on remaining as far from melee combat as possible. From a distance she channels the power of nature against her foes.

The Druid channels her love of nature into healing abilities, vicious plants and earth shaking tremors. A strong backbone to any party, the Druid can shape the battlefield to the advantage of her companions.

At rest, the Druid will attempt to cleanse the surrounding area of corruption and contact small animals to learn more about future challenges her party might encounter, The Druid also makes a fantastic cup of soup and gets cranky if her companions refuse to taste it.
This place has been taken by corruption, I shall cleanse it.
Oh really? thank you for the aid little one.
I made us some soup dearies, have some!
A fine mulch you shall make.
I should have brought a bigger bag.
Is this how I shall pay for my sins?
The tree still stands, and so do I!
I have seen daisies more fearsome than you!
What is there realy to be afraid off?
My duty is not yet fulfilled.
The corruption will be driven back!
These old bones are not done yet!
Folow me, I shall bring you to safety!
Flowers bloom even after the most harsh of winters!
Do not worry, I have been doing this for a long time.
Follow my lead young one, I will lead you to safety
Come, we shall purify this place!
Our bark is worse than their bite!
The corruption is everywhere, it is inescapable!
The corruption is everywhere, it is inescapable!
One of you is a host for deceases, do not try to hide it!
These old bones have seen too much.
I am nothing more than a vile witch, death would be too kind a faith for me...
As I have sacrificed another so too must I be sacrificed...
Must I do everything around here?
Some must be culled so the strong may live, you fools are a fine example of that.
The wilds would swallow you within a day.
The young should listen to their elders!
You would make some fine mulch.
You will not stand in the way of my redemption!
I am too old to deal with the likes of you!
These old bones have seen too much...
I am nothing more than a vile witch, death would be too kind a faith for me...
My back hurts... my knees are weak... it will not be long before I finally die...
STOP FOLLOWING ME, THE SACRIFICE WAS NECESSARY

The trees here make no sense...
Stop asking questions, I am too old to answer them.
Nature is twisted here, we best keep moving.

I don't need any help! I will take care of this myself!

Друид предпочитает только легкую броню. Ей целесообразнее сражаться в дальнем бою, так как она использует магию природы.
Друид использует свою любовь к природе во благо здоровья союзников, к тому же она способна создавать землятресения и призывать растения.
Друид способен очищать местность от скверны, а также она делает потрясающую похлебку и растраивается, если компаньоны отказываются ее пробовать.
Это место было заражено скверной.. Я очищу его.
Неужели я заплачу за свои грехи?
Дерево все еще живо, и я тоже!
И я серьезно должена была испугаться этого?
Эти старые кости еще на что-то сгодятся!
Следуй за мной, я позабочусь о твоей безопасности.
Цветы расцветают даже после самых суровых зим!
Следуй за мной, я позабочусь о твоей безопасности.
Один из вас — мертвец! Не пытайтесь скрыть этого!
Эти старые кости видели слишком много.
Я не лучше мерзкой ведьмы, смерть это меньшее на что мне стоит надеятся...
Поскольку я пожертвовала другим, я тоже должна быть принесена в жертву ...
Некоторые из них должны умереть, чтобы сильные могли жить...
Вы не станете мешать моему искуплению!
Я слишком стара, чтобы иметь дело с подобными вам!
Эти старые кости повидали слишком много...
Я не лучше мерзкой ведьмы, смерть это меньшее на что мне стоит надеятся...
У меня болит спина ... мои колени слабы ... это пройдет не скоро, пока я, наконец, не умру ...
ПРЕКРАТИТЕ ИДТИ ЗА МНОЙ, ЖЕРТВА НЕОБХОДИМА
Жизнь и смерть являются частью одного и того же цикла. Мы должны умереть, чтобы мы могли жить!
Прекрати задавать вопросы, я слишком стара, чтобы отвечать на них.
Здесь природа искажается, нам лучше бежать!
Пожалуйста, не заставляй меня идти первым.
Не думаю что от меня есть какая-то польза.
Чего ты ждешь!? Вот она я!
Бей меня! Избавь меня от грехов!
Не хочешь ли ты побыть денек наедине с дикарями?
Я что, должена все делать сам?
Мне не нужна помощь! Я справлюсь и сам!
Я не умру, потому что это невозможно!
Я так много сделал, и для чего?
Скверна уничтожит природу, а потом и нас...
Кровь кровь кровь, кровь омоет нас...
Я, я, я не знаю что делать!
Держи эту штуку подальше от меня!
Нет, это то, чего они хотят от нас!
Я ничего не буду делать, пока ты стоишь так близко!
Нет! Я больше не буду тебя слушать!
Потише! Я не могу думать спокойно!
Вы идиоты! Почему я должен делать все сам?
Не думай, что ты меня обманешь, я буду впереди!
За мной! Я нашла безопасное место.
Прекрати задавать вопросы, я слишком стара чтобы отвечать на них!
Приходите и испытайте себя против могущества природы!
Не стой так близко со мной!
Иди сюда, дорогая, у бабушки есть подарок для тебя.
Может, это цена за то, что я сделала.
Может, это цена за то, что я сделала.
Ты понимаешь? Я должна это сделать!
Нет, не сейчас! Я не оставлю его снова!
Вы дураки, вызвали это из-за вашей некомпетентностью!
Даже у природы нет никаких шансов против них!
Я уверен, что в следующий раз вы иправитесь!
На этот раз вы все таки напали?
Все, что вы делаете, делает его более безумным!
Мы могли бы закончить это мирно!
Нам никогда не пробить их доспехи!
Как вы можете пропустить что-то, что легко ударить?
Должен ли я все делать сам?
Нет нет нет! вы должны ударить их сзади!
В любом случае, это лучше, чем суп.
Нет, я должна сделать это сама!
Нет, я должна сделать это сама!
Нет, я должна сделать это сама!
Нет, я должна сделать это сама!
Нет, я должна сделать это сама!
Нет, я должна сделать это сама!
Нет, я должна сделать это сама!

Нет, я должна сделать это сама...
Нет, я должна сделать это сама...
Я вижу конец ... все это было напрасно?
Зимой или летом дерево выживет, так же как мы.
Я видела за свою жизнь много воинов, ты один из лучших.
Вы видели этого кролика раньше? Я нарисовала вам его.
Эта рана нуждается лечении, хорошо, что я здесь.
У меня есть травы для вас, они могут вас исцелить.
О, перестаньте жаловаться, моя спина болит больше, чем эта маленькая царапина.
Не сдавайся, я прямо позади тебя.
При достаточной заботе даже цветы можно воскресить.
Сама природа - это коллекция многих замечательных вещей, прямо как наша маленькая группа.
Стоит ли мне приготовить немного супа?
Я когда-нибудь рассказывала вам о времени, когда я ...
Ооо ... у меня болит спина, но покой принесет мне пользу.
The Druid wears only light robes - intent on remaining as far from melee combat as possible. From a distance she channels the power of nature against her foes.

The Druid channels her love of nature into healing abilities, vicious plants and earth shaking tremors. A strong backbone to any party, the Druid can shape the battlefield to the advantage of her companions.

At rest, the Druid will attempt to cleanse the surrounding area of corruption and contact small animals to learn more about future challenges her party might encounter, The Druid also makes a fantastic cup of soup and gets cranky if her companions refuse to taste it.

As I have sacrificed another so too must I be sacrificed...
Must I do everything around here?
Some must be culled so the strong may live, you fools are a fine example of that.
The wilds would swallow you within a day.
The young should listen to their elders!
You would make some fine mulch.
You will not stand in the way of my redemption!
I am too old to deal with the likes of you!
These old bones have seen too much...
I am nothing more than a vile witch, death would be too kind a faith for me...
My back hurts... my knees are weak... it will not be long before I finally die...
STOP FOLLOWING ME, THE SACRIFICE WAS NECESSARY
Life and death are part of the same cycle, We must die so we can live!
The trees here make no sense...
Stop asking questions, I am too old to answer them.
Nature is twisted here, we best keep moving.
Please, don't make me go further!
The shadows! they hide in the shadows!
Don't think I haven't figured out your plan.
What are you waiting for? I am right here!
Hit me! punish me for my sins!
You would not last a day alone in the wilds.
I don't need any help! I will take care of this myself!
I will not die because of your mistakes!
I have done so much, and for what?
The corruption will destroy nature, and then it will destroy us.
What is that? is it important?
I left my soup pot on!
Blood blood blood, blood will cleanse us all!
I, I, I don't know what to do!
Keep that thing away from me!
No, that's what they want us to do!
I'm not doing anything with you standing so close to me!
Have you tried doing it yourself?
No! I'm not listening to you anymore!
I am not falling for that.
Be quiet! I can't think with you fools screaming in my ears!
Make space! I shall take care of this.
You idiots! Why must i do everything myself?
Do not think you can fool me, I shall lead the way!
Make space! I shall take care of this.
I will take care of this myself!
Follow me! I found a safe haven!
The trees here make no sense...
Stop asking questions, I am too old to answer them.
Come and test yourself against the might of nature!
Run, I will hold them off...
Don't stand so close to me!
Come over here dearie, granny has a gift for you.
A sacrifice! I need a sacrifice!
Maybe this will pay fot what I have done.
This pain will help me focus.
Maybe this will pay fot what I have done.
Do you not understand!? I have to do this!
We can't escape what lives in our mind!
No not yet! I will not abandon him again!
It is using nature against me!
You fools caused this with your incompetence!
This is how it should be.
Even nature stands no chance against them!
Almost, I am certain that you will do better next time dearie!
Stop that! you are ruining the corpse!
You actually hit something this time?
All you are doing is making it more mad!
We could have ended this peacefully!
We will never pierce their armor!
You are trying to miss? are you not!?
How can you miss something that easy to hit?
No no no! you are supposed to hit them from below!
That was an easy to block attack! why are you trying to get us all killed?
I am right here you fools!
Am I below your notice? it's not proper to ignore an old lady!
That one is better off as mulch anyway.

I can see the end... was it all for nothing?
Winter or summer a tree will survive both, just like us.
I have seen my fair share of warriors, you are one of the best.
Did you see that rabbit earlier? I drew you a picture.
That wound needs some cleaning, good thing I am here.
I have same herbs for you, they will help you heal.
Oh stop complaining, my back hurts more than that little scratch.
Don't give up, I am right behind you.
Given enough care even a dying flower will bloom again.
Nature herself is a collection of many wonderfull things, just like our little group.
Shall I make us some soup?
